## Koatty.setMetaData() method

Set metadata value by key.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setMetaData(key: string, value: any): void;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

key


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The key of metadata. If key starts with "\_", it will be defined as private property.
